=New Reporting User Interface=

 
<p align="justify"> Urchin 7 features new, significantly improved Reporting UI. New styling, easy-to-read graphic charts and navigation features allow more flexibility and power in data analysis.</p>

[http://urchin-web-analytics-software.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/New_UI.png] 

<p align="justify"> The Advanced Segments feature introduced in Urchin 7 allows to create custom visit segments and apply them to the reports.  

[http://urchin-web-analytics-software.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Advanced_Segments.png] 

<p align="justify"> A new Display Dimension selector enables to switch the displayed dimensions for drill-down reports to allow more flexible drilling.

[http://urchin-web-analytics-software.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Cross-report_drilling.png] 

<p align="justify"> Permanent links have been added to Urchin 7 reports. Permalinks preserve the selected display settings of the report like filtering, paging, date range etc. and can be embedded into e-mail, Web pages or IM'ed. 

[http://urchin-web-analytics-software.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Printview_Permalink.png] 
 
<p align="justify"> Reports have been renamed and regrouped to simplify navigation and unclutter the navigation panel. Tabs have been introduced to keep closely-related reports together. Please see [http://code.google.com/p/urchin-web-analytics-software/wiki/ReportRegrouping|Urchin 7 Report Regrouping] for more details.

[http://urchin-web-analytics-software.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Browsers_Platforms.png] 

<p align="justify"> Context links to HC articles have been added to the Urchin 7 Reporting UI. 

[http://urchin-web-analytics-software.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Urchin_Help_Center.png]
